::: {.callout-note appearance="minimal" title="Scheduling Appointments"}

To schedule a meeting with the course instructor during office hours,
please visit the [Google Calendar for Office
Hours](https://calendar.app.google/4ekYyCcKqGanEBqC8). You can schedule an
appointment by clicking a suitable box in Google Calendar and then reserving an
open time slot. At this point, the details about your chosen appointment will
appear in both your Google Calendar and the instructor's Google Calendar. Please
arrive five minutes in advance for your meeting and be aware that, by necessity,
the meeting before yours may sometimes run late.

:::
